member.name: D3D12_VERSIONED_DEVICE_REMOVED_EXTENDED_DATA
member.summary: Represents versioned Device Removed Extended Data (DRED) data, so that debuggers and debugger extensions can access DRED data.

member.name: D3D12_VERSIONED_DEVICE_REMOVED_EXTENDED_DATA.Version
member.summary: A value, specifying a DRED version. This value determines which inner data member (of the union) is active.

member.name: D3D12_VERSIONED_DEVICE_REMOVED_EXTENDED_DATA.Dred_1_0
member.summary: A value, containing DRED version 1.0 data.

member.name: D3D12_VERSIONED_DEVICE_REMOVED_EXTENDED_DATA.Dred_1_1
member.summary: A value, containing DRED version 1.1 data.
